divs: sighting detailsobserved while taking out trash around 9:30. object appeared to be a single bright, white light. no physical structure to be apparent. appeared to be lower than the cloud line because the clouds seemed to reflect the light from the object, as if the light source was below cloud cover. object disappeared sometime after sighting. **note** object reappeared following night, 10\07\13 alongside a much larger sized, circular object which i mistook for the moon at first. accompanying object appeared to be non luminous itself but seemed to reflect the light from the sports arena at siu.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Carbondale
There were no other sightings in Carbondale on or around October 6th 2013
